title: Lambda to Athena
description: Create a Lambda function that queries a prefilled Athena table using boto3 library

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to a Lambda function to invoke a query execution to an Athena database table and fetch them from the same.

bullets.text: How can I schedule an Amazon Athena query?
Creating tables in Athena - Creating tables using AWS Glue or the Athena console

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Saborni Bhattacharya
authors.bio: I am Saborni Bhattacharya and I love making technical contents on my YouTube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpYl6SiNRBfcZoi4EKqIwog. Here is my blog link as well - https://learnandexplorewithsab.blogspot.com/
